body:
i wasnt sure where to put this <3 sry if its in the wrong place.anyway m idea for a game:

1. it is similer to a game on another server i play on but that game is still in beta.


2. ive wanted a game like this for a long time on avicus but i was too lazy to make a post about it but since we are in a slump i thought this game might help :D


3. the game is bassiclly this: 


     A)you have kits and abilitys to choose from.


B) some ideas for kits would be giving a diamond chestplate and 16 enderpearls and maybe a few gold apples.      
C) some ideas for abilities would be one that takes away fall damage and turins it into strgth or regen or maybe fall damage heals you (incuding enderpearl damage)          
D) the point of the game is: you get good or bad loot from chests. in the beginning of the game you have invinsibley for 2 to 3 mins. after that you fight.
E) i love this game but i know avicus needs help and i like the community on avicus way better. (the community on the other server is rly bad) 

F) but either way i feel ike this will help avicus a lot

hope this helped =) -micahb222000

replies.body:
with spellcheck:

I wasn’t sure where to put this <3 sorry if it’s in the wrong place. Anyway m idea for a game:
1. it is similar to a game on another server I play on but that game is still in beta.
2. I’ve wanted a game like this for a long time on Avicus, but I was too lazy to make a post about it, but since we are in a slump i thought this game might help. :D
3. The game is basically this:  A) you have kits and ability’s to choose from.  B) Some ideas for kits would be giving a diamond chest plate and 16 enderpearls and maybe a few gold apples.        C) some ideas for abilities would be one that takes away fall damage and turns it into strength or regen or maybe fall damage heals you (including ender pearl damage)            D) the point of the game is: you get good or bad loot from chests. In the beginning of the game you have invisibility for 2 to 3 mins. After that you fight. I love this game but i know avicus needs help and i like the community on avicus way better. (The community on the other server is rly bad) but either way I feel like this will help avicus a lot .
replies.body_tagged:
with spellcheck:

I wasn’t sure where to put this <3 sorry if it’s in the wrong place. Anyway m idea for a game:
1. it is similar to a game on another server I play on but that game is still in beta.
2. I’ve wanted a game like this for a long time on Avicus, but I was too lazy to make a post about it, but since we are in a slump i thought this game might help. :D
3. The game is basically this:  A) you have kits and ability’s to choose from.  B) Some ideas for kits would be giving a diamond chest plate and 16 enderpearls and maybe a few gold apples.        C) some ideas for abilities would be one that takes away fall damage and turns it into strength or regen or maybe fall damage heals you (including ender pearl damage)            D) the point of the game is: you get good or bad loot from chests. In the beginning of the game you have invisibility for 2 to 3 mins. After that you fight. I love this game but i know avicus needs help and i like the community on avicus way better. (The community on the other server is rly bad) but either way I feel like this will help avicus a lot .
